body: I created a Radiance glass material with zero transmittance. However, there seems to be reflections on the glass surface based on the rendering shown below (those floating surfaces). May I ask if Radiance glass material reflective by default? If it is the case, shall I just change the material to plastic since the transmittance is zero?  Thanks. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/LwgxVloM62KzvGu6U70rVW6EvaeoMZ7kpCn5o3TtWNOrDES1UwGs*4fQYBxLvlse5rPfj6nIeIDtBgjB7kS0fL8y0*czlc-e/Image3.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/LwgxVloM62IalDwW2JYWkI1odQBnkvEfwzluvM4X8njvp7tmsQDiNZpMabslO7Rr7WF-5OeWUBzJDetp2CjdOff38jsHMx*m/Image2.png)
topic: [radiance] is radiance glass material reflective by default?
